channel.title: Need help setting level req to kill npc
channel.description: What number do I set it so you have to be a certain level to kill the npc, not slayer skill.

item.title: Need help setting level req to kill npc
item.dc:creator: @DallasTGM DallasTGM
item.description:
@DallasTGM wrote:

…I know that I asked for the combat number…
Edit: Let me try prima. It worked, thank you.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help setting level req to kill npc

item.title: Need help setting level req to kill npc
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Search for:

case 72:

In there add this:

if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == ####) { if (combat <= ##) { ResetAttackNPC(); sendMessage( "You need a combat level of ## to Attack Abyssal demons."); } }

Replace the ‘####’ With the ID of the NPC, and replace the ‘##’ With the combat level required to attack the NPC.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help setting level req to kill npc

item.title: Need help setting level req to kill npc
item.dc:creator: @bomb65 bomb65
item.description:
@bomb65 wrote:

im not sure about combat level, but for changing what skill level you need you change
the 2783 to the npc id and the [18] to the player level and then >=50 to what you need.

if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 2783) {
if (playerLevel[18] >= 50) {
slayer = true;
} else {
slayer = false;
sendMessage(
“You need a slayer level of 50 to attack dark beasts.”);
}
}

Read full topic
